attributes.action: medical cannabis to become legal for all ages
attributes.additional_details: I would like to make this petition to be recognised and open to anyone to sign
attributes.background:
To make Medical Cannabis legal for anyone who would like to use it to heal them 
This needs to be available for all age groups 
As it is our God given right to use what healing herbs x plants we think may help  us or we have experienced healing from it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598861
